numlitem.para: Takeoff and Landing Performance Limited weight is reduced by 10,100 lbs.
Descent profile should be based on (higher RPM) approach idle on affected engines.
Reduce Takeoff and Landing Performance Limited weight by 10,100 bs.

placard.para: Placard near associated Engine Fuel Control switch "L (R) MIN IDLE INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
